item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“Goneby123, post:1, topic:120804”]Ok i took this from freescape //Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @red@007@cya@Pkerz", 6570); sendFrame126("@red@Owner=@whi@007 Pkerz", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

i put it but it wont show up lol…is there anything else i need to put? lik? writeplayers()? help pleasE??[/quote]

Put writePlayers(); in process.
